I agree with that. I'm a little older, but it's the same idea. I see all these games come out or that have come out and part of me wishes I could go back to when I played more, because they look really interesting/fun. But these days I keep finding I don't have as much time or energy to devote to video games as I once did. Other things just happen to feel more important at the moment.

That doesn't mean I don't play at all, just in very short bursts.
